info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 8:06PM EDT until August 13 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Orange and Seminole.
* WHEN...Until 930 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 806 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orlando, Sanford, Altamonte Springs, Winter Springs, Winter Park, Casselberry, Maitland, Lake Mary, Longwood, Lockhart, Goldenrod, College Park, Pine Hills, Fern Park, Fairview Shores, Forest City and Eatonville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EDT THIS EVENING
